abstract: After several weeks of insisting its foreclosure processes were sound, Wells Fargo & Company said on Wednesday that it planned to correct and resubmit up to 55,000 improperly filed documents by mid-November.
snippet: After several weeks of insisting its foreclosure processes were sound, Wells Fargo & Company said on Wednesday that it planned to correct and resubmit up to 55,000 improperly filed documents by mid-November.
lead_paragraph: After several weeks of insisting its foreclosure processes were sound, Wells Fargo said Wednesday that it planned to correct and resubmit up to 55,000 improperly filed documents by mid-November, Eric Dash reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: Wells Fargo to Amend About 55,000 Foreclosure Files
